txt.en: 'Thank you for relieving the prison-wardens of Naerband of some of their captives, [placeholder]! I will tell Frodo this happy news straight-away!\n\n'Here is your reward. Come back tomorrow and I should have another request with which you can help.'
Nurnhoth captives can be found within the fortress of Naerband, in southern Talath Úrui.

'I have asked our friends to give me requests that can be fulfilled by willing adventurers such as you. Some, such as Samwise Gamgee, are reluctant to make any such requests; others, like Peregrin Took, are entirely too eager to send adventurers out into danger!

'My task for you today is a request from Frodo Baggins. He spoke to me of the plight of the Nurnhoth captives in Gorgoroth; it seems he knows something of the cruelty with which the Orcs treat their prisoners.

'If you can enter the prison of Naerband, in Talath Úrui, and free some of the Nurnhoth captives held within, I know Frodo will be pleased. I will also have a reward for you if you are able to see it done.'
Aster Hayward is in Tham Periain.
Daily Request: An Errand for Frodo
Talk to Aster Hayward in Tham Periain
Aster Hayward conveyed a request to you from Frodo Baggins, who wishes to free some of the Nurnhoth enslaved by the forces of Mordor.

'If you can enter the prison of Naerband, in Talath Úrui, and free some of the Nurnhoth captives held within, I know Frodo will be pleased. I will also have a reward for you if you are able to see it done.'
'How can it be? I never thought...'
